alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:19AM CST until January 12 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR WESTERN POINSETT AND NORTHERN CROSS COUNTIES... At 119 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hickory Ridge, or 13 miles southwest of Harrisburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trumann, Harrisburg, Cherry Valley, Hickory Ridge, Waldenburg, Fisher, Payneway, Hydrick, Wiley Crossing, Birdeye, Supply, Weona Junction, Weona, Stewart, Brushy Lake, Maple Grove, Mersman, Promised Land, Bay Village, and Judd Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
